Text.Page:
Whatever those mekonaris are doing is monstrous.

Those spectral legates? Souls tortured into feeding on pain and suffering. They hunt down the freshly dead so they can't return to the Dream.

Maybe Killian summoned them. Maybe they just followed the food. Whichever it is, you must stop their feasting.

Deft work, .

Thanks! Those unnatural things were turning my whiskers white!

, ever see a spirit torn away from the Dream? You'd never sleep right again.

Nature's weeping over this. Wipe out those spectres!
